channel.title: Delete
channel.description: Decided to quit... Servers again I really don't feel like wasting time doing this again.. sorry for the one interested appeal ...

item.title: Delete
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

[quote=“L s R, post:2, topic:164240”]I don’t want to join your coding team, Because I utterly fail at coding…But I do have a few suggestions and ideas to help improve your server. (If you ever need more, or a storyline written send me a PM)

  1. at least 471 game frame (or custom)

  2. for game frame, customize buttons etc. (1 and 2 will attract new players ATON)

  3. Totally custom areas, I wouldn’t suggest copying anything, even ideas

  4. Don’t spawn too many objects, they lag like hell for most people

  5. Have custom quests, new story ines etc.

Basically what I’m saying, if you customize everything, it will be much more appealing and attract people. Web clients attract people too, no Downloading :)[/quote]

Thanks but if you’v heard of Rune-Keep or BattleScape… Our server will take place upon the same island. I favour it for the bridge that can lead into my Pking zone. : )

Read full topic

item.title: Delete
item.dc:creator: @L_s_R L s R
item.description:
@L_s_R wrote:

I don’t want to join your coding team, Because I utterly fail at coding…But I do have a few suggestions and ideas to help improve your server. (If you ever need more, or a storyline written send me a PM)

  1. at least 471 game frame (or custom)

  2. for game frame, customize buttons etc. (1 and 2 will attract new players ATON)

  3. Totally custom areas, I wouldn’t suggest copying anything, even ideas

  4. Don’t spawn too many objects, they lag like hell for most people

  5. Have custom quests, new story ines etc.

Basically what I’m saying, if you customize everything, it will be much more appealing and attract people. Web clients attract people too, no Downloading
